<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Vibrant Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=467)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 399 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your body sprouts a coat of brambly thorns that harm those that strike you and thrive on life magic. Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that hit you with unarmed attacks, take 1 piercing damage each time they do. Anytime you cast a positive spell, the damage from your thorns increases to 1d6 until the start of your next turn.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1, or 1d6 after you cast a positive spell.
name: Vibrant Thorns
